scripts.harness: (cd Analyzer; npm run harness) && (cd harness; npm run harness) && (cd Renderer; npm run harness)
scripts.lint: (cd Analyzer; npm run lint) && (cd callWhenProcessEntryPoint; npm run lint) && (cd dependencyAndStructure; npm run lint) && (cd harness; npm run lint) && (cd harness; npm run lint) && (cd Processors; npm run lint) && (cd Renderer; npm run lint) && (cd Tests; npm run lint)
scripts.test: (cd Analyzer; npm run test) && (cd dependencyAndStructure; npm run test) && (cd Processors; npm run test) && (cd Renderer; npm run test)
